DOC.brief_summary: Removable false teeth ( call removable partial denture ( RPDs ) ) commonly make people miss teeth . RPDs make framework replacement teeth/gum . The framework sit teeth gum make different material , metal non-metal , different property . The plastic teeth gum sit framework . A common framework material cobalt chromium , rigid , non-precious metal alloy . Other framework material include titanium non-metal material medical grade polyetheretherketone ( PEEK ) . A review literature show research report investigating different RPD framework material impact person 's oral health relate quality life ( OHQoL ) . The sensation different framework mouth quite varied people , would relevant able tell patient type framework well tolerate base research evidence . We hope conduct un-blinded randomise crossover pilot trial investigate difference patient preference oral health relate quality life measure patient centred outcome group patient due receive tooth support removable partial denture Charles Clifford Dental Hospital .
